title: MQ Spec Intermediate JSON Tree
description: Schema for the intermediate JSON tree representation of parsed MQ message specifications

sourceFile.description: Path to the source Excel specification file

sharedHeaderFile.description: Path to the shared header specification file (if applicable)

parserVersion.description: Version of the parser that processed this specification

operationName.description: Operation name extracted from the specification

sharedHeader.description: Shared header fields common across messages

fields.description: Array of field nodes in this group

originalName.description: Original field name as it appears in the Excel specification

camelCaseName.description: CamelCase version of the field name for Java bean properties

className.description: Class name for object definitions (used when isObject is true)

length.description: Field length constraint (null for unbounded fields)

optionality.description: Optionality indicator: 'M' for mandatory, 'O' for optional

defaultValue.description: Default value to use when field is not present

hardCodeValue.description: Hardcoded value that must be used regardless of input

isArray.description: Flag indicating this field represents an array (repeating structure)

isObject.description: Flag indicating this field represents an object (nested structure)

isTransitory.description: Flag indicating this field is transitory and should not appear in final output

children.description: Child field nodes for nested structures

sheetName.description: Name of the Excel worksheet containing this field

rowIndex.description: 1-based row index in the source worksheet
